column1: The Pit Room////I came here for a work event and boy was I not disappointed! The brisket is as fatty and juicy as everyone says it is. A must during your visit. The pulled pork was also flavorful and smokey without putting sauce on it
column2: which is sometimes hard to find. You'll also have plenty of options for sides and drinks. Though the inside area is small for seating
column3: head on outside since the outdoor deck is shared between the two restaurants and you'll be able to fit bigger parties out there. Enjoy!
